sentences.sContent: But we are now a much more fragmented society.
sentences.sCn: 但是我们现在是一个更加四分五裂的社会。

sentences.sContent: If we leave now we’ll be there before dark.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们现在出发，天黑之前就能赶到那里。

sentences.sContent: ...Preparation has been made; now is the time for the venture of the work itself...
...and the paintings are now lodged deep in his autobiographical memories...
...it now turns out that exercise can exhaust not only your muscles...
...but the thrill of young love seems to have shifted a gear in his mind: from now on...
...Your identity has been formed; you’ve built up your resources; and now you have the chance to take the big risks precisely because your foundation is already secure...
...and until now have only reported minor accidents...
...Product transitions take much less time now than in the past...
...The run has been taken; now is the time to leap...
...What could have been considered the beginning of a descent is now a potential turning point—the turning point you are most equipped to take full advantage of...

phrases.pCn: 至今，直到现在，迄今为止
又怎么了（表示感到厌烦）；现在该怎么办
[表示警告或引起注意等]看，瞧
勿失良机，机不可失；把握现在
立即应用；马上申请；在线申请
